parameters.name: document
parameters.description:
The GraphQL document. It can include queries & mutations.
For example `query OperationName($code:ID!) {country(code:$code) {name}}`.

parameters.name: variables
parameters.description: The GraphQL variables. For example `{"code": "<variable_value>"}`.

parameters.name: operationName
parameters.description:
The GraphQL operation name. If a request has two or more operations, then each operation must have a name.
A request can only execute one operation, so you must also include the operation name to execute.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: The GraphQL API headers to execute each query

parameters.name: targetType
parameters.description:
The payload, which is expected to be returned after data binding. For example
`type CountryByCodeResponse record {| map<json?> extensions?; record {| record{|string name;|}? country; |} data;`

returnParameters.description:
The GraphQL response or a `graphql:ClientError` if failed to execute the query
# Deprecated
This method is now deprecated. Use the `client->execute()` API instead

remoteMethods.name: executeWithType
remoteMethods.description:
Executes a GraphQL document and data binds the GraphQL response to a record with data and extensions
which is a subtype of GenericResponse.
descriptionSections:
# Deprecated
This method is now deprecated. Use the `client->execute()` API instead

parameters.name: document
parameters.description:
The GraphQL document. It can include queries & mutations.
For example `query countryByCode($code:ID!) {country(code:$code) {name}}`.

parameters.name: variables
parameters.description: The GraphQL variables. For example `{"code": "<variable_value>"}`.

parameters.name: operationName
parameters.description:
The GraphQL operation name. If a request has two or more operations, then each operation must have a name.
A request can only execute one operation, so you must also include the operation name to execute.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: The GraphQL API headers to execute each query

parameters.name: targetType
parameters.description:
The payload (`GenericResponseWithErrors`), which is expected to be returned after data binding. For example
`type CountryByCodeResponse record {| map<json?> extensions?; record {| record{|string name;|}? country; |} data; ErrorDetail[] errors?; |};`

returnParameters.description: The GraphQL response or a `graphql:ClientError` if failed to execute the query

remoteMethods.name: execute
remoteMethods.description:
Executes a GraphQL document and data binds the GraphQL response to a record with data, extensions and errors
which is a subtype of GenericResponseWithErrors.

parameters.name: serviceUrl
parameters.description: URL of the target service

parameters.name: clientConfig
parameters.description: The configurations to be used when initializing the `connector`

returnParameters.description: An error at the failure of client initialization

parameters.name: document
parameters.description:
The GraphQL document. It can include queries & mutations.
For example `query countryByCode($code:ID!) {country(code:$code) {name}}`.

parameters.name: variables
parameters.description: The GraphQL variables. For example `{"code": "<variable_value>"}`.

parameters.name: operationName
parameters.description:
The GraphQL operation name. If a request has two or more operations, then each operation must have a name.

parameters.description:
The payload (`GenericResponseWithErrors`), which is expected to be returned after data binding. For example

parameters.name: serviceUrl
parameters.description: URL of the target service

parameters.name: clientConfig
parameters.description: The configurations to be used when initializing the `connector`

returnParameters.description: An error at the failure of client initialization

clients.name: Client
clients.description: The Ballerina GraphQL client that can be used to communicate with GraphQL APIs.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `graphql:Service` object to attach to the listener

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the service to be hosted

returnParameters.description:
A `graphql:Error` if an error occurred during the service-attaching process or the schema
generation process or else `()`

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description: Attaches the provided service to the Listener.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen to the GraphQL service endpoint

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The additional configurations for the GraphQL listener

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error` if the listener initialization is failed or else `()`

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `graphql:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `graphql:Service` object to attach to the listener

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the service to be hosted

returnParameters.description:
A `graphql:Error` if an error occurred during the service-attaching process or the schema
generation process or else `()`

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attaches the provided service to the Listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The service to be detached from the listener

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error` if an error occurred during the service detaching process or else `()`

methods.name: detach
methods.description: Detaches the provided service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service starting process, otherwise nil
A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service stopping process, otherwise nil

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Gracefully stops the graphql listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error` if an error occurred during the service stopping process or else `()`

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen to the GraphQL service endpoint

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The additional configurations for the GraphQL listener

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error` if the listener initialization is failed or else `()`

Invoked during the initialization of a `graphql:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of the GraphQL request.

parameters.name: errorDetail
parameters.description: The error to be added to the response.

functions.name: __addError
functions.description: Adds an error to the GraphQL response. Using this to add an error is not recommended.

parameters.name: encodedSchemaString
parameters.description: Compile time auto generated schema

returnParameters.description: Subgraph schema in SDL format as a string on success, or an error otherwise

functions.name: getSdlString
functions.description: Obtains the schema representation of a federated subgraph, expressed in the SDL format.
